title: The Role of Real Estate in Social and Economic Justice
itunes:title: The Role of Real Estate in Social and Economic Justice
description:
Don Peebles, CEO of The Peebles Corporation, discusses the role of real estate in addressing social and economic justice.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
